There's camaraderie that you haven't seen in 10 years on this show. I get along with Randy Jackson , and J Lo is a fox; she's street, she's got a great heart. Tem Dwaine Caraway gave a`` key to the city'' to Michael Vick . The action spawned outrage from many North Texans( including NBCDFW Mayor Tom Tom Leppert releasing the following statement on Monday afternoon: The action taken was not sanctioned by my office and was not an official ceremonial honor on behalf of the City of Dallas. Official Keys to the City are presented by the Mayor Tom , or an elected official designated by the Mayor Tom , and reserved, on a limited basis, for an elected official of international status. Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and done without my knowledge or approval. Given these circumstances I have requested the City Manager propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future. I think the world's a better place with[ former Iraqi president] Saddam Hussein gone and with the Taliban gone and the al-Qaeda out of Afghanistan, he said, adding that the President Bush administration's decision to invade Iraq in the wake of the Sept. 11 attacks on the US was`` incremental,'' not rushed.
